Wendy's Sold to Arby's Owner
From Apryl Duncan, About.com Guide April 29, 2008
Follow me on:
Facebook Twitter Fast food restaurant Wendy's has been sold for a reported $2.34 billion. The number three burger chain will now be a part of Triarc, which owns Arby's. Can Triarc Save Wendy's?:
